description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller 'HelloController' providing several basic endpoints: a welcome message, API documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A Spring Boot REST controller providing basic endpoints for a ticket metrics backend service.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/' and returns a welcome message.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/docs' and redirects to Swagger UI, preserving the original request scheme, host, and port.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/health' and returns the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Handles GET requests to '/api/info' and returns application info.
